column4: can someone tell me what the {} brackets are doing in the following command line: find * -maxdepth 0 -name 'test_mp4s.zip' -prune -o -exec rm -f /var/www/test/*.zip '{}' ';''
they replace the filename that comes out of the find command. man find should you tell more.
you already posted what it looks like.
The folks and the topic in #bash may prove especially useful.
